title: Collaborative Study Room
description: A real-time collaborative platform where students can join study rooms, share notes, and work together on projects. Features include video/audio chat, shared whiteboard, and document collaboration.

title: Personal Task Manager
description: A full-featured task management application with project organization, priority levels, due dates, and progress tracking. Helps users stay organized and productive.

title: Job Portal Backend
description: A robust backend API for a job portal platform handling job postings, applications, user authentication, and search functionality. Includes role-based access control.

title: E-Commerce REST API
description: A complete e-commerce backend API with product management, shopping cart, order processing, payment integration, and admin dashboard. Scalable and secure architecture.
